meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks were so incredible that the audience gasped in amazement.
meanings.sent2: The story of the talking animals was truly incredible.
meanings.sent3: It was incredible to think that a cat could speak fluent English.
meanings.sent4: The idea of flying without wings seemed as incredible as a unicorn.
meanings.sent5: The sight of a rainbow at midnight was truly incredible.

meanings.sent1: The cake was so incredible that everyone asked for seconds.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was absolutely incredible.
meanings.sent3: It was incredible how fast the little squirrel could climb the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was so incredible, it sounded like a choir of angels.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was truly incredible, lighting up the night sky.
